trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME}: Average Usage over 5sec per Processor#{#SNMPINDEX} exceeded 80%

Device Model Name
Disk Capacity
Disk Usage
FortiOS version
Virus signature database version
IPS signature database version

item_prototype.name: Serial number of $1
Software version of $1

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet hardware:fgHardInvSerial[{#SNMPVALUE}].diff(0)}>0
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME}: Serial number of {#SNMPVALUE} was changed

item_prototype.name: Fan alarm status on {#SNMPVALUE}
Fan speed on {#SNMPVALUE}

item_prototype.name: Number of intrusions blocked on virtual domain $1
Number of intrusions detected on virtual domain $1

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsBlocked[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}>1.2*{Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsBlocked[{#SNMPVALUE}].avg(600)} and {Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsBlocked[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}<1.3*{Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsBlocked[{#SNMPVALUE}].avg(600)}
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME}: An increase of 20% of blocked intrusions in the virtual domain {#SNMPVALUE} was detected

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsDetected[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}>1.2*{Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsDetected[{#SNMPVALUE}].avg(600)} and {Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsDetected[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}<1.3*{Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsDetected[{#SNMPVALUE}].avg(600)}
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME}: An increase of 20% of detected intrusions in the virtual domain {#SNMPVALUE} was detected

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsBlocked[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}>1.3*{Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsBlocked[{#SNMPVALUE}].avg(600)} and {Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsBlocked[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}<1.4*{Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsBlocked[{#SNMPVALUE}].avg(600)}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsDetected[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}>1.3*{Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsDetected[{#SNMPVALUE}].avg(600)} and {Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsDetected[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}<1.4*{Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsDetected[{#SNMPVALUE}].avg(600)}
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME}: An increase of 30% of detected intrusions in the virtual domain {#SNMPVALUE} was detected

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsBlocked[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}>1.4*{Template Dev Fortinet IDS:fgIpsIntrusionsBlocked[{#SNMPVALUE}].avg(600)}
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME}: An increase of 40% of blocked intrusions in the virtual domain {#SNMPVALUE} was detected

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortigate Cluster:fnSysSerial.change()}<>0
trigger.name: Primary device changed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: ({Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.last(0)}-{Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.avg(86400)})>0.2 * {Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.last(0)} and ({Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.last(0)}-{Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.avg(86400)})<0.3 * {Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.last(0)}
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: An increase of 20% of ipv4 active sessions was detected

trigger.expression: ({Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.last(0)}-{Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.avg(86400)})>0.2 * {Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.last(0)} and ({Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.last(0)}-{Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.avg(86400)})<0.3 * {Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.last(0)}
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: An increase of 20% of ipv6 active sessions was detected

trigger.expression: ({Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.last(0)}-{Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.avg(86400)})>0.3 * {Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.last(0)} and ({Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.last(0)}-{Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.avg(86400)})<0.4 * {Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.last(0)}
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: An increase of 30% of ipv4 active sessions was detected

trigger.expression: ({Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.last(0)}-{Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.avg(86400)})>0.3 * {Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.last(0)} and ({Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.last(0)}-{Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.avg(86400)})<0.4 * {Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.last(0)}
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: An increase of 30% of ipv6 active sessions was detected

trigger.expression: ({Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.last(0)}-{Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.avg(86400)})>0.4 * {Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSesCount.last(0)}
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: An increase of 40% of ipv4 active sessions was detected

trigger.expression: ({Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.last(0)}-{Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.avg(86400)})>0.4 * {Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSysSes6Count.last(0)}
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: An increase of 40% of ipv6 active sessions was detected

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet CPU:fgSysCpuUsage.avg(1h)}>50 and {Template Dev Fortinet CPU:fgSysCpuUsage.avg(1h)}<75
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: CPU usage exceeded 50%

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet CPU:fgSysCpuUsage.avg(1h)}>75 and {Template Dev Fortinet CPU:fgSysCpuUsage.avg(1h)}<90
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: CPU usage exceeded 75%

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet CPU:fgSysCpuUsage.avg(1h)}>90
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: CPU usage exceeded 90%

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet EnvMon:fgSysDiskUsage.last()}>(0.9*{Template Dev Fortinet EnvMon:fgSysDiskCapacity.last()})
trigger.name: {Host.NAME}: Disk usage over 90%

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet EnvMon:fgSysDiskUsage.last()}>(0.95*{Template Dev Fortinet EnvMon:fgSysDiskCapacity.last()})
trigger.name: {Host.NAME}: Disk usage over 95%

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet EnvMon:fgSysVersionIps.diff(0)}>1
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: IPS signature database was changed

trigger.expression: ({Template Dev Fortinet memory:fgSysMemUsageBytesUsed-.avg(600)}/{Template Dev Fortinet memory:fgSysMemCapacity.avg(600)})>50
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: Memory usage(used-) exceeded 50%

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet memory:fgSysMemUsage.avg(600)}>70 and {Template Dev Fortinet memory:fgSysMemUsage.avg(600)}<75
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: Memory usage exceeded 70%

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet memory:fgSysMemUsage.avg(600)}>75 and {Template Dev Fortinet memory:fgSysMemUsage.avg(600)}<80
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: Memory usage exceeded 75%

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet memory:fgSysMemUsage.avg(600)}>80
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: Memory usage exceeded 80%

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSIAdvSesEphemeralCount.last(0)}>{Template Dev Fortinet sessions:fgSIAdvSesEphemeralLimit.last(0)}
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: Number of ephemeral sessions exceeded the limit

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet EnvMon:fgSysVersion.diff(0)}>0
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: Software version was changed

trigger.expression: {Template Dev Fortinet EnvMon:fgSysVersionAv.diff(0)}>1
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: Virus signature database was changed
